text: Wiccan (real name William Billy Kaplan-Altman) is a fictional character appearing in American comic books published by Marvel Comics. He is the reincarnated son of Wanda Maximoff and Vision and the twin brother of Tommy Shepard. He is a member of the Young Avengers and was named after Simon Williams and has a romantic relationship with Hulkling. == In other media == An illusory Billy appears in the Marvel Cinematic Universe Disney+ miniseries WandaVision (2021), played by Baylen Bielitz and Julian Hilliard. Hilliard returned as a human version of Billy from an alternate reality in the movie Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness (2022). Billy Kaplan made his live-action debut in the MCU Disney+ miniseries Agatha All Along (2024), played by Joe Locke. Category:Marvel Comics characters
title: Wiccan (character)
